item.title: NYCFC Announces Etihad Park as Name of New Soccer-Specific Stadium

item.title: Navy Unveils Jolly Rogers-Inspired Football Uniforms For 125th Army Game
item.description: The Navy Midshipmen will wear alternate uniforms that pay homage to the Jolly Rogers during their 125th annual rivalry game with Army.
